line.originaltext: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
line.annotation: create_ing(ing0, "4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
1 onion, chopped
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
line.annotation: create_ing(ing3, "1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers")

line.originaltext: 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes
12 small chile peppers, diced (optional)
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
line.annotation: create_ing(ing6, "1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup")

line.originaltext: 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth
1 bunch green onions, chopped
1/2 pint heavy cream
6 (6 inch) corn tortillas
3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce
Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips.
Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips.
line.annotation: cut(ing0, t0, ing13, "chicken breast strips", "1 inch strips")

line.originaltext: Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
line.annotation: cook(ing1, t3, ing16, "hot oil", "heat over medium heat")

line.originaltext: Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown.
Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown.
Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown.
Stir in diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, stewed tomatoes, chile peppers, soup and broth.
line.annotation: combine({ing18, ing3, ing4, ing5, ing6, ing7}, ing19, "soupy stuff", "combine")

line.originaltext: Stir in diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, stewed tomatoes, chile peppers, soup and broth.
Bring mixture to a boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing20, t3, ing21, "boiled soupy stuff", "bring to boil")

line.originaltext: Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear.
line.annotation: chefcheck(ing22,"chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Remove chicken from skillet, and shred when cool enough to handle.
Remove chicken from skillet, and shred when cool enough to handle.
line.annotation: cut(ing23, t0, ing25, "shredded chicken", "shred when cool")

line.originaltext: Meanwhile, allow skillet mixture to simmer and reduce to about 2 1/4 cups.
Meanwhile, allow skillet mixture to simmer and reduce to about 2 1/4 cups.
In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture).
line.annotation: separate(ing26, ing27, "1/4 cup soup", ing28, "2 cup soup", "separate")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture).
line.annotation: combine({ing25, ing27}, ing29, "chicken paste", "combine to paste")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture).
Mix together with half the chopped green onions.
line.annotation: separate(ing8, ing30, "1/2 chopped green onions", ing31, "1/2 chopped green onions", "split")

line.originaltext: Mix together with half the chopped green onions.
Pour remaining 2 cups of skillet mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Pour remaining 2 cups of skillet mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil.
In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil.
line.annotation: cook(ing9, t5, ing33, "hot cream", "heat over low heat")

line.originaltext: In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil.
Dip tortillas in the warm cream to soften and coat.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing33}, ing34, "creamy tortillas", "dip into cream")

line.originaltext: Spoon about 1/3 cup chicken mixture onto each tortilla.
line.annotation: combine({ing32, ing34}, ing35, "chicken in tortilla", "spoon 1/3 cup into each")

line.originaltext: Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas.
line.annotation: separate(ing11, ing36, "1 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese", ing37, "1 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese", "split")

line.originaltext: Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas.
line.annotation: combine({ing35, ing36}, ing38, "cheesy tortillas", "top chicken mixture with cheese")

line.originaltext: Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas.
Place rolled tortillas in baking dish, seam side down, and drizzle with enchilada sauce.
Place rolled tortillas in baking dish, seam side down, and drizzle with enchilada sauce.
line.annotation: combine({ing12, ing39}, ing40, "saucy tortillas", "drizzle with sauce")

line.originaltext: Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese.
Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese.
Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese.
Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.
Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.
